name: Outlook - Dark
description:
主要就是修改成黑色的背景，然后适当的修改些文字的颜色，其他没有什么质的的变化！
I just make the background very dark and good to read!!!

user.name: Lee Ping-Nam
user.about: Hello everybody, I am glad to be here and I like CSS. When I surf some pages, I want to modify the CSS code of these pages because they are very urgly and too bright! I don't know how to say, just to see the effect of the page!
